kamkaru janathawata wassa menma awwada ekase huru puruduya.wassata themena owun awwata weleyi.me dekenma pidawindinuye kamkaruwan wina palakayan nowe.namuth ese bidawanne palathayinta nathahoth dhanapathiyanta mandirayan thanimata nowannehida?owunge sawimath datha nowannata ratak kisida godanangiya nohaka.meya rambaukkana himi wataha gaththada rajadaruwanta nam kisida nowatahe.mandira thula sukhawidina owun kese nam kamkaru wange le,dahadiya suwanda hadunagamda?kamakaruwage malagama dina kandulak helannata nowa madurehi sudu kodiyak wath ellimata raja daruwanta waradimakinwath sihi nowe.eya wu kali kamkaruwanta thama kala sewaya wenuwen labena prathilabhayayi.dhanapathiyanta owun hudu wahallun wina manushyayin nowe.

ipadunu mohothema damagiya bawata sakakarana bilindakuge mala sirurak mahanuwara maha rohale kanuwaka thibi eeye (12) dahawal hamu wi atha.mahanuwara maha rohale pilika wattu sankirnaye pitupasa kanuwaka thibi mema bilindu mala sirura soya ganini.sayanayakata pamini kanthawaka daruwa prasutha kota anathuruwa rohal kanuwe dama yannata athayi polisiya saka karayi.me athara siddhiyata sambandha sakakara mawa soya polisiya pulul parikshana aarambha kara atha.

shri lanka nidahas pakshaya saha eksath jathika pakshaya athara athsan thabunu awabodhatha giwisuma prakarawa katayuthu karena bawa ohu kiwe ya.amathyawaraya ese kiwa da, mema giwisuma pasugiya sapthambaraye di awasan wiya.awabodhatha giwisuma pilibada kala sadahanen amarawira, rajaye agamathiwaraya wanne ranil wikramasinha bawath ohu ema thanathure idiriyatath katayuthu karanu athi bawath, piliganna bawa pahadili wiya.wenasak sidukirime awashyathawaya da gena hara dakwamin adahas dakwu amarawira, rajaye aarthika kalamanakarana katayuthu wiwechanaya karamin, rate jathika awashyathawa wenuwen wana yahapalana prathipaththinta pitupa eeta sampurnayenma wenas wadapiliwelak anugamanaya karamin sitina bawata chodana kale ya.eya sathyayak wuwa da, deshapalanaye di ewani wenaskam apeksha kala yuthuya.atham awasthawala udgatha wana thaththwayan thama thamange prathipaththi matha dadiwa elbagena sita katayuthu kirimata deshapalagnyayin yomu kirimata tharam prabala wana athara, thawath awasthawala ewani thaththwayan thama thamange pawathma thaka ee dakwa katayuthu karamin siti aakaraye pahadili wenasak sidukirima dakwa deshapalagnyayin yomu kirime samathya.hasyayata karuna wanne mese depasata kakul thabagena katayuthu karanathura owun pawasana deya janathawa wishwasa karathayi balaporoththu wimaya.
tharangaya yana kisima awasthawaka lankawata ho kridakayinta apahasa upahasa wana eka wachanayak ho owun nokiwe owunge hadichchakama nisama wiya yuthuya.
